title: Cruel Summer
description:
Cruel Summer is such a bop but the story and emotion behind it is so sad. Ana, Amy, Nick and Lacey dissect and discuss what made the summer of 2016 such a cruel one for Taylor. Plus, the five holes frenzy continues!
What did we miss? What would you like to hear next? Let us know!
